titles.en: Chapter 5 – How did they answer and they were particles

titles.ar: بَابُ كَيْفَ أَجَابُوا وَ هُمْ ذَرٌّ
titles.en: Chapter 5 – How did they answer and they were particles

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: حسن - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (36/ 7)
text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ بَعْضِ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ قَالَ قُلْتُ لِأَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) كَيْفَ أَجَابُوا وَ هُمْ ذَرٌّ قَالَ جَعَلَ فِيهِمْ مَا إِذَا سَأَلَهُمْ أَجَابُوهُ يَعْنِي فِي الْمِيثَاقِ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from one of our companions, from Abu Baseer who said,

‘I said to Abu Abdullah<sup style="font-weight: normal">asws</sup>, ‘How did they answer and they were particles?’ He<sup style="font-weight: normal">asws</sup> said: ‘It (the ability) was Made to be in them what, when they were asked, the could answer with, meaning regarding the Covenant’.
en.sarwar: 1. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ibn abu ‘Umayr from certain persons of our people from abu Basir who has said the following: “Once I asked abu ‘Abd Allah (a.s.) ‘How did they answer when they (offspring of Adam) were small particles?’ The Imam said, ‘Allah placed in them the ability to answer Him when He questioned them at the time of establishing a covenant with them.’”
